topic.title: How do I contact the Support Center at each IU campus, and what are the hours and options for help?

body.note: KM staff: This doc is now in the oncoursecl and fp domains, as well as all. If you add any kbas to it at any point in the future, be sure to kbsecure them to all, unless the doc in question is also in those domains. This also applies to any boilers that may appear in the doc.

You can find answers to your computing questions in this Knowledge Base by entering your search terms in the box above. ITHelpLive (live chat with a consultant) is also available daily 8am-midnight; log in with your Indiana University Network ID. Guest accounts will not allow authentication to ITHelpLive, but if you have a Guest account, you may use all the other support options below.
